participant_1.background:
I was married to my first husband for nine years before we got divorced.
I enjoy the company of warriors like myself.
I love dressing up in hunter green, even if it makes my family laugh.
i have been to 7 countries in europe and 3 countries in asia.
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.

participant_2.background:
My weight is normal.
i have woman calling me all the time.
i enjoy playing recreational games like cards , darts or billiards.
i worry about my image.
I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.

content.text: Hi there!  How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.  How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks!  I love to travel, have you ever been out of the country?
Yes, I've been to a few countries in Europe and Asia.  I love to experience different cultures.
That's awesome!  I've been to a few countries in Europe, but I'd love to travel to Asia someday.  What are your favorite places you've traveled to?
My favorite place was Japan.  The people are so friendly and the food is amazing.  I also really enjoyed my time in Thailand.
Those sound like great places to visit.  I've heard great things about both Japan and Thailand.  What's your favorite thing to do when you travel?
I love to try new foods and explore new places.  I also enjoy meeting new people and learning about their culture.
I love to do those things too!  I'm always up for trying new things and meeting new people.
That's great!  We should go traveling together sometime.
I'd love that!  We could have a lot of fun exploring new places together.
